Chefchaouen.name: Medina Blue Alleyways
Chefchaouen.description: Iconic indigo lanes with artisan shops, riads, and mountain views

Chefchaouen.name: Outa el Hammam Square
Chefchaouen.description: Central plaza with kasbah, Grand Mosque, cafes, and evening street life

Chefchaouen.name: Kasbah Quarter
Chefchaouen.description: Fortified heart with gardens, museum, and Andalusian architecture

Chefchaouen.name: Ras El Maa
Chefchaouen.description: Waterfall area at the medina edge with river cafés and hillside trails

Chefchaouen.name: Souika Street
Chefchaouen.description: Spice shops, woven rugs, and local eateries along a bustling bazaar lane

Chefchaouen.name: Andalusian Quarter
Chefchaouen.description: Quiet lanes with blue-painted homes, courtyards, and traditional fountains

Chefchaouen.name: Spanish Mosque Hill
Chefchaouen.description: Sunset viewpoint overlooking the blue city and Rif Mountains

Chefchaouen.name: Aïn Haoua Oasis
Chefchaouen.description: Green belts and picnic spots along the river outside the medina
